message: Let's split the money 60/40. This gives us both a decent share.
Your previous offer was a bit too tilted in your favor. Let's make it a bit more equitable, considering the inflation.
I understand you want a more equitable split. How about 58/42? It considers the inflation while still giving us a good deal.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and get out of here before inflation eats up all our potential gains.
